The full teragen command
````
time sudo -u ernest hadoop jar /opt/cloudera/parcels/CDH/jars/hadoop-examples.jar teragen -D dfs.block.size=33554432 -D mapred.map.tasks=6 51200000 /user/ernest/tgen512m	

````

The output of the time command
````
real    1m34.330s
user    0m5.516s
sys     0m0.232s
````
